comments.comment: 20 gattu eka hari kiyanna wage com dapu gon wasso  ubala kauruhari a wage tanakata gihella tiyenawada ? Podu prawahanasewayaka gihen tiyenawada ..podu wesikileyakata gihella tiyenawada  ..bus ekata vitarak salli athe tiyana gamanak yana asarana manussayekuta a wage awasyathawayak una wena welawata 10ta 20k  ganna eka harida ?    .pode ekage edalawath hora boru nate ratak hadapalla .maha banku horu apita allanna barewenna puluwan  ath  podi minessun asarana minessunta karana me wage wanchawal natarakaranna hadadde loku katha nokiya aduma tarame paduwe idapalla gon hatta nodakin

replies.replyComment: Ube thaththa e miniha wenna athi .yako maha ewn horakan karana ewa madiwatada .u ekenuth 10k wediputa ganne .topi wage amana widihata hithana un innakan lankawa hadanna be..ubath herek kiyala ratama denagannawa.
Ane pala yako oya 10 podi miniyata ochara kiyawanne mha bankuwa horu allapiya ratama kala tiyenne uba 10 gena kiyanna awa palyayan ban yanna.

Rupiyal 10 k loku wereddak name 900 billion gena a mathakada. Rupiyal 10 wedipura gaththe nikan nemei e wele 20k hari dila wede karagaththa kiyala sathutu weyalla sathutin thawa kiyak hari diyalla e manussayata mokada apita e job eka karanna be
